prompt: In 1970, about how much did a new Ford Mustang cost (base MSRP)?

answer.notes: Base MSRP for 1970 Mustang fastback; coupe/convertible varied. Ford official data.

image.title: 1970 Ford Mustang (Boss 302 variant)

verified_facts.claim: Base MSRP for 1970 Mustang fastback was $2,872.

bonus_specs.notes: Boss 302 was higher trim; base was lower.
